etomica.virial.overlap

Class AccumulatorVirialOverlapSingleAverage

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataProcessor
      • etomica.data.DataProcessorForked
        • etomica.data.DataAccumulator
          • etomica.data.AccumulatorAverage
            • etomica.data.AccumulatorAverageFixed
              • etomica.data.AccumulatorAverageCovariance
                • etomica.data.AccumulatorRatioAverageCovariance
                  • etomica.virial.overlap.AccumulatorVirialOverlapSingleAverage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPipe, DataPipeForked, IDataSink, IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class AccumulatorVirialOverlapSingleAverage
extends AccumulatorRatioAverageCovariance
    Accumulator for taking ratio between two sums (and pretend it's an "average") Data added to this accumulator must be a 2-element DataDoubleArray

    • Method Detail

      • setBennetParam

        public void setBennetParam(double aCenter,
                           double aSpan)
        sets the range of parameter values used for Bennets method. Default is a span of 5 centered about 1 (exp(-5) to (exp(5)).
        Parameters:
        aCenter - geometric mean of all values
        aSpan - natural log of ratio of max value to aCenter

      • setNumAlpha

        public void setNumAlpha(int newNumAlpha)

      • getBennetBias

        public double getBennetBias(int iParam)
        Returns iParam'th factor used in the Bennet sum. Higher values indicate the overlap function is more like the 0th value.
